summary: Ceuta is a Spanish city located in North Africa, near the border with Morocco. It is a special part of the European Union, known as an autonomous city. Before 1995, it was part of the province of CÃ¡diz. The city has a mix of Christian and Muslim residents, with a few Jewish and Hindu people too. Spanish is the official language, but many people also speak Darija Arabic. Ceuta was once a free port, and it used to be a regular municipality before gaining its autonomy.
title: Ceuta
